properties.displayName: Enable Remote Connection Between Anonymous Computer - AllowAnonymousCallback
properties.query:
DeviceRegistryEvents
| where RegistryValueData =~ "DWORD (0x00000001)" and RegistryKey contains "\\Microsoft\\WBEM\\CIMOM\\AllowAnonymousCallback"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects enabling of the "AllowAnonymousCallback" registry value, which allows a remote connection between computers that do not have a trust relationship.
